comment: Irony here too is that a Wolf in Sheeps clothing was literally the coat of arms chosen by the Fabian Socialists in England. Many Aussie politicians are members.

            :domain (c / coat
                  :mod (a / arms)

                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Fabian"
                                    :op2 "Socialist")
                              :location (c3 / country

                                          :op1 "England"))))
                  :domain (w / wolf
                        :location (c4 / city

            :mod (t / too))
      :snt2 (h / have-org-role-91

                              :op1 "Australia"))
                  :quant (m2 / many))

                  :name (n5 / name

            :ARG2 (m3 / member)))
